#### Libraries

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

#### Data

```{r}
data<- read_csv(here("data", "processed_data", "tx_master.csv"))
```

# Cleaning

#### Filter out NA Dates

```{r}
data<-
  data %>%
  filter(!is.na(site),
         hr_cst %in% c("00", "01"))
```

#### Select Columns for Sankar

```{r}
data<- 
  data %>% 
  select(copies_mL, Va, Vc, Vv, Vp, tot_bacteria, site, date, VAI, hf_copies_mL) %>%
  rename("Total_Vibrio" = "copies_mL",
         "Total_Bacteria" = "tot_bacteria",
         "HF183" = "hf_copies_mL")
```

#### Re-order columns

```{r}
col<- c("date", "site", "Va", "Vc", "Vp", "Vv", "Total_Vibrio", "Total_Bacteria", "HF183", "VAI")
data<- data[,col]
```

# Save

```{r}
write_csv(data, here("data", "processed_data", "qpcr", "qPCR_clean.csv"))
```
